name: Willis' Resignation
description:
Step into the shoes of one Willis Mcgillis. 

One of the top admins for a yet unnamed and undisclosed discord gamer group. For years he has been weathering the toxic and abrasive nature of those around him with nerves of steel.

But not anymore. He's been told to be considered a "true" member of the group he has to rage quit and come crawling back after some undetermined amount of time.

The choice is yours. Will Willis talk to the big boss man and turn in his resignation? Or just turn tail and head home, keeping his job, yet losing the respect of the true members

One choice, two outcomes. How will you change the life of Willis McGillis?

Includes

  • Walking
  • Jumping
  • Crouching
  • Sprinting
  • 7 interactable characters
  • Multiple endings

Controls

  • A and D - Movement
  • Shift (hold) - Enable sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • S (hold) - Crouch
  • E - Interact
